schemacrawler.schema

Interface Trigger

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AttributedObject, Comparable<NamedObject>, ContainedObject<Table>, DatabaseObject, DependantObject<Table>, DescribedObject, NamedObject, Serializable

    public interface Trigger
extends DependantObject<Table>
    Represents an trigger.
    Author:
    Sualeh Fatehi

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getActionCondition()
      Gets the WHEN clause of the trigger.
      int getActionOrder()
      Gets the action order.
      ActionOrientationType getActionOrientation()
      Gets whether the trigger is a row trigger or a statement trigger.
      String getActionStatement()
      Gets the body of the trigger.
      ConditionTimingType getConditionTiming()
      Gets the condition timing.
      EventManipulationType getEventManipulationType()
      Gets the event manipulation type.

    • Method Detail

      • getActionCondition

        String getActionCondition()
        Gets the WHEN clause of the trigger.
        Returns:
        Action condition.

      • getActionOrder

        int getActionOrder()
        Gets the action order.
        Returns:
        Action order.

      • getActionOrientation

        ActionOrientationType getActionOrientation()
        Gets whether the trigger is a row trigger or a statement trigger.
        Returns:
        Action orientation.

      • getActionStatement

        String getActionStatement()
        Gets the body of the trigger.
        Returns:
        Body of the trigger.

      • getConditionTiming

        ConditionTimingType getConditionTiming()
        Gets the condition timing. BEFORE = the trigger is executed before the triggering data manipulation operation; INSTEAD OF = the trigger is executed instead of the triggering data manipulation operation; AFTER = the trigger is executed after the triggering data manipulation operation.
        Returns:
        Condition timing.

      • getEventManipulationType

        EventManipulationType getEventManipulationType()
        Gets the event manipulation type. The trigger event - INSERT, DELETE, or UPDATE.
        Returns:
        Event manipulation type
